reviews.customers_say: Customers like the sweater's colors, with one noting it looks like an Anthropology look, and appreciate its fit, with one mentioning it hits right above the hips. Customers disagree on the comfort level.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Anthro feel and an affordable price!
items.body: Appears to have great quality and looks like an Anthropology look. Thick, soft and pretty colors. I ordered the lavender color. Due to reviews I ordered a small to fit my size and frame, 5’2”/124 lbs. It fits perfectly hitting right above my hips. I may get the cream/ dark green color too. Read more
items.author: suebea114

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful warm sweater
items.body: Great sweater. Thick so better for cold weather. High quality. Anthro vibe. Recommended. For is loose, but not oversized. Read more
items.author: LelloN

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good buy
items.body: Super cute and thick! True to size Read more
items.author: Casey Turner

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute very thick
items.body: Lots of compliments. Wish it was a little less scratchy and more comfortable. Get hot fast. Great for very cold but will need to cool off still. Read more
items.author: Hailey White

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very pretty and nice fit !
items.body: Design is really pretty and could easily pass as Benetton or DeSigual . Sizing is correct and roomy . I usually wear M or L in sweaters depending of style and I ordered M and it fits with ample room though not baggy or oversized. I am 5'6" and length is little bit below middle of hips - just perfect. Neck is not too tight - I HATE anything touching my neck and was worried it might be the case but it is not. Fabric is VERY thick and fluffy - could be easily worn as final layer on mild winter days. I ordered both colors and found cream one better looking on me since I am "mature" lady lol. Green actually has pink top part , not off white as it looks on a photo so it is "too sweet" for my age. If it was off white I would have kept that one too. I washed sweater on cold and delicate cycle in a washing bag and it came out as new. I am very happy with this purchase. Read more
items.author: nv

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice weight, well made but the collar doesn't match
items.body: A little prickly for me (very sensitive skin). The yarns for all the colors are layered under in the knit, but not at the cuffs & neck. The neck is actually a much brighter yellow-ivory next to a darker grey-oatmeal tone for the top yoke area. Overall a cute sweater, but I'll return because of these issues. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flower sweater
items.body: Beautiful sweater. True to size. Read more
items.author: I did not receive the 2 pair of earrings. Send or credit my card.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fabulous Fall Outfit maker
items.body: This sweater is beautiful! I paired with a striped white and blue dress shirt underneath dress pants and pointed leopard flats! It was a very fall pretty moment! Read more
items.author: tiffany

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Hunter Green, Pink, Purple, Mocha. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
